price: 5. Markuu yimid wacadkii hore (kii koowaad), waxaan idinku soo dirnay addoomo aan leennahay oo xoog badan (Jaaluut iyo ciidankiisa) oo ku daran dagaalka. Markaasay galoo baxeen guryihiinna dhexdooda, wuxuuna ahaa wacad la fuliyey5.
arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ أُولَىٰهُمَا بَعَثۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمۡ عِبَادٗا لَّنَآ أُوْلِي بَأۡسٖ شَدِيدٖ فَجَاسُواْ خِلَٰلَ ٱلدِّيَارِۚ وَكَانَ وَعۡدٗا مَّفۡعُولٗا
footnotes: 5. Cadaabka loogu gooddiyey midka hore labadoodii caasiyoobid, Iyagoo ku xadgudbaya xurmaddooda, inay wax dilaan oo baabbi’yiaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā jāa waʿdu ūlāhumā baʿathnā ʿalaykum ʿibādan lanā ulī basin shadīdin fajāsū khilāla al-diyāri wakāna waʿdan mafʿūlan
